name: Warmancers of the Aether
description:
Warmancers of the Aether (WotA) is a 2.5D, incremental, idle, rogue-lite, ARPG, necromancy game in early development, expected to end up on all major platforms.

Raise the dead to fight for you, unlock the secrets of the Aether plane!

Setting

Across time and space, a few unique individuals unlock the ability to resurrect the dead.

The instant they gain this power, they’re teleported to a vast cluster of worldlets - a space prison floating in the Aether plane.

Themselves, they name: WARMANCERS.

Controls

Left-click,  WASD or arrow keys will move your character around.
Right-click or space bar will interact with things in the world.

Feedback, Ideas?

WotA is on Reddit (https://www.reddit.com/r/Warmancers/) and Discord (https://discord.gg/uDdMmGbA)
